quotes.quote: Change not only was inevitable, but usually brought its own rewards.
Once your mindset changes, everything on the outside will change along with it.
Every positive change in your life begins with a clear, unequivocal decision that you are going to either do something or stop doing something.
We are restless because of incessant change, but we would be frightened if change were stopped.
You never change your life until you step out of your comfort zone; change begins at the end of your comfort zone.
Change is inevitable, The great question of our time is whether the change will be by consent or coercion.
When we realize that the beliefs holding us back are frauds, we realize we can change those beliefs and make different choices.
If we don't change, we don't grow. If we don't grow, we aren't really living.
Don't be afraid of change. You may lose something good, but you may gain something better.
Everything is in a process of change, nothing endures; we do not seek permanence.
The world as we have created it is a process of our thinking. It cannot be changed without changing our thinking.
There isn't anything in your life that cannot be changed.
Change your thoughts and you change your world.
You have to change the set, stay ahead of the curve.
Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
They must often change, who would be constant in happiness or wisdom.
Change the changeable, accept the unchangeable, and remove yourself from the unacceptable.
You cannot change your future, but you can change your habits, and surely your habits will change your future.
Don't confuse poor decision-making with destiny. Own your mistakes. It's ok; we all make them. Learn from them so they can empower you!
If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.
Your mind is a powerful thing. When you fill it with positive thoughts, your life will start to change.
Don't waste your energy trying to change opinions. Do your thing, and don't care if they like it.
If you can't do anything about it then let it go. Don't be a prisoner to things you can't change.
For every positive change you make in your life, something else also changes for the better it creates a chain reaction.
To improve is to change; to be perfect is to change often.
If you change the way you look at things, the things you look at change.
Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
Sometimes you hit a point where you either change or self destruct.
Don't let the concept of change scare you as much as the prospect of remaining unhappy.
Nothing is so painful to the human mind as a great and sudden change.
